title: Do the City of Wilmington and New Hanover county have energy managers?  With all of the outlying buildings in the city and county, it seems like an energy manager could produce huge savings for each entity.  Those savings would pay for the position plus more.  Even though it\'s a larger city by 5x, Albuquerque, NM has a team of 9 on it\'s energy council.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18262
